item.title: 【Introductions & Farewells】Hi MTV Fans
item.description:
Hi MTV Fans, I'm JC2023 nice to meet you all,

I've joined since last month, and what you're about to read is everything you need to know about me...

I'm a fan of the MTV Video Music Awards, But Also The MTV Movie Awards Too

You All Know That Coming Up , The 40th Anniversary Annual Show Of The MTV Video Music Awards Airing Live On Tuesday September 12th 2023

And To Celebrate The 40 Years Of Since The First Awards Back In 1984,

I'm Looking For The Past MTV Video Music Awards MTV News Pre-Show Coverages From 1990-1999, 2000-2008 And 2010-2019


Google Drive Links For Past MTV VMA MTV News Pre-Show Coverages is What I'm Looking For, My Goal Is To Watch Every Past MTV News Pre-Show Before The Live coverage of the 2023 MTV VMA Pre-Show on September 12th,

Also you're more welcome to share the links of past MTV Movie Awards MTV News pre-show and post show from 1992-2009

Nice to meet you all, and lastly let's look forward for the 40th anniversary of the MTV Video Music Awards on Tuesday September 12th and let's look forward to a brighter 2024 for the return of the MTV Movie Awards with the 2024 MTV Movie And TV Awards To Be Hosted By Drew Barrymore
item.author: JC2023
